CustomField.description: Start of the working time for a service resource or a crew in Salesforce
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) >= 3, MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) <= 10, OR( AND(MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) > 3, MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) <10), AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) = 3, DAY(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) >= DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,31) -MOD(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,31) - DATE(1900,1,7),7) )), AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) = 10, DAY(DATEVALUE(StartTime)) < DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),10,31) -MOD(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),10,31) - DATE(1900,1,7),7) )) ) ), LPAD(TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((HOUR(TIMEVALUE(StartTime)) + 1), 24))), 2, "0"), LPAD(TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((HOUR(TIMEVALUE(StartTime))), 24))), 2, "0") ) & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(StartTime))), 2, "0")
CustomField.label: Start Time
